AboutContent: Iâ€™m a final-year undergraduate student at BITS Pilani, Pilani Campus where I am pursuing dual major in Computer Science and Chemistry.
If you ever see me lost in my thoughts, I am probably thinking about how can technology be applied to solve our everyday problems.

I am passionate about Software Development, Machine Learning and Computer Vision. I like to think about their different applications and try to experiement with it. I also love football, dancing and community services :)
As much as I love to work and hustle, I also like to travel and indulge into adventures!
WorkContent: I am currently open to work in the field of Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Software Development.
